nodes.text: The Cavaell system was the origin point of the cookies known as Cavaellin spice creams. The Artiodac chef Strono Tuggs learned of the cookies from an old 434 unit and mentioned them and their origin point in The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, a cookbook he wrote sometime after the Battle of Takodana in 34 ABY.

The Cavaell system was introduced to the new Star Wars canon in the 2019 recipe book Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, authored by Chelsea Monroe-Cassel and Marc Sumerak. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the Cavaell system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry.
